title: [gameplay] Runaan's Hurricane interactions
body:
Runaan's Hurricane no longer interacts with certain abilities and items like it did before patch 5.22.

(1a) Ashe no longer gains 1/2/3 stacks on Q for 1/2/3 targets being Runaan's no longer fires additional bolts when Q is active. Right now it shoots 5(Q)+2(RH)=7 projectiles when it was firing 5x3=15 projectiles.

(1b) Runaan's no longer grants 10/20/30 charges for Statikk Shiv when attacking 1/2/3 targets.

(2a) To reproduce buy RH on Ashe and auto a group of creeps, will only gain one stack per AA (100% replication). Once fully stacked activate Q and continue to AA, only up to 2 secondary bolts will fire as opposed to the previous 10 (100% replication).

(2b) Buy SS after RH then AA a group of creeps, only 10 charges will be gained per AA as opposed to the previous 10/20/30 (100% replication).

replies.body: I believe Ashe now works like that on purpose because her Q no longer has CD. Likely so that she has a very static ramp up time. Her W no longer applies a stack either, it's only AA's, likely an 'on-attack' sorta thing rather than an on-hit. Rageblade is now the same way and as you noticed, the Energized attacks are on-attack rather than on-hit.
Just played ARAM with Thresh.. couldn't buy Runaan's..  "Ranged Heroes Only"
